name: Yourtown
tagline: is a tool for exploring historic urban atlases in Yourtown and telling stories about how places have changed over time
institutionalCredit: A project of [Yourtown](https://example.org) and the [Leventhal Map & Education Center at the Boston Public Library](https://www.leventhalmap.org)

outOfBoundsMessage.text: Leave a note for users who just scrolled off the map... perhaps inviting them to sponsor an atlas?

splashPageNoteMessage.text: Leave a note for users who just open the splash page... perhaps inviting them to sponsor an atlas?

metaTags.title: Atlascope Yourtown
metaTags.description: Atlascope Yourtown is a tool for exploring historic urban atlases in Yourtown and telling stories about how places have changed over time. A project of Yourtown and the Leventhal Map & Education Center at the Boston Public Library.

openGraph.title: Atlascope Yourtown
openGraph.description: Atlascope Yourtown is a tool for exploring historic urban atlases in Yourtown and telling stories about how places have changed over time. A project of Yourtown and the Leventhal Map & Education Center at the Boston Public Library.

images.alt: Excerpt from an 1898 atlas plate showing the Boston Public Library and buildings, streets, and other urban features nearby in Copley Square.

twitter.title: Atlascope Boston
twitter.description: Atlascope Boston is a tool for exploring historic urban atlases in metropolitan Boston and telling stories about how places have changed over time. A project of the Leventhal Map & Education Center at the Boston Public Library.
twitter.imageAlt: Excerpt from an 1898 atlas plate showing the Boston Public Library and buildings, streets, and other urban features nearby in Copley Square.
